title: Audrey Cordon-Ragot Stays with Human Powered Health for 2024
content:
The American team adds Romy Kasper and Maëlle Grossetête to next year's roster, making it five confirmed riders for 2024.

Read the full article at Audrey Cordon-Ragot Stays with Human Powered Health for 2024 on Velo.
author: sadhbhoshea
